Text: Why upload this? Anyone can download 1.08 pirated or not. Crack Sunset Invasion and upload that if you want to do something actually useful.

Patience, young padawan.

Good, Fast, Cheap - Pick Two.

Does anyone know where the directory for CK2 is supposed to be? Everytime I try and run the patch it says "Crusader Kings 2 is not installed". I've been moving the folder all around trying to find the right directory for it.
@rallybanner just use the check for update button in the ck2 launcher
Thanks for the response doom, but it still didn't work. Once it finished downloading I clicked run and it said the same thing.

@rallybanner install this http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7406041/Crusader_Kings_2_v.1.06___Sword_of_Islam_DLC then http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7743592/Crusader_Kings_2_-_patch_1.07___Legacy_of_Rome then try the update
@Doomdemon Alright, thanks. I believe those are the two I already have, but I'll try it and post results.
Alright. That worked. Not sure how I messed up my other installation. Thanks, Doom.
